languages.text: "Я..." {n}Ирлиэт ошеломленно взирает на игровое поле. Ваши слова так и не коснулись ее чуткого слуха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Ирлиэт ошеломленно взирает на игровое поле. Ваши слова так и не коснулись ее чуткого слуха.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Yrliet contempla fijamente el tablero con expresión demudada. Tus palabras ni siquiera han llegado a sus oídos, por agudos que son.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Yrliet contempla fijamente el tablero con expresión demudada. Tus palabras ni siquiera han llegado a sus oídos, por agudos que son.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は…」{n}ユリエットは呆然と遊戯盤を見つめている。彼女の耳は敏感だが、あなたの言葉は決して届くことがなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は…」{n}ユリエットは呆然と遊戯盤を見つめている。彼女の耳は敏感だが、あなたの言葉は決して届くことがなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我……”{n}伊莉耶特怔怔地盯着棋盘。尽管她的听力一贯敏锐，但她似乎没有听到你的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}伊莉耶特怔怔地盯着棋盘。尽管她的听力一贯敏锐，但她似乎没有听到你的话。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Yrliet fixe le plateau de jeu, abasourdie. Vos mots ne parviennent jamais à ses oreilles, aussi sensibles soient-elles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Yrliet fixe le plateau de jeu, abasourdie. Vos mots ne parviennent jamais à ses oreilles, aussi sensibles soient-elles.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Yrliet starrt benommen aufs Spielbrett. Deine Worte dringen nicht zu ihr durch, so sensibel ihre Ohren auch sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Yrliet starrt benommen aufs Spielbrett. Deine Worte dringen nicht zu ihr durch, so sensibel ihre Ohren auch sind.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Sersemlemiş hâldeki Yrliet, gözlerini oyun tahtasına dikiyor. Sözlerin, o çok hassas kulaklarına ulaşmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}Yrliet stares at the game board, stunned. Your words never reached her ears, as sensitive as they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben..." {n}Yrliet, sersem bir hâlde gözlerini oyun tahtasına dikiyor. Ne kadar hassas olurlarsa olsunlar kulaklarına sözlerin ulaşmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
